content: i have had this design in mind for some time i love the oblique lines that looks so fine when it turns around a bit and now i finally cracked the code for the technique i ve fallen in love with it so the name became favorite christmas ornament 2021 it also gives a bit of an expectation / hope that i can design a new one every year the oblique and many color changes are quite nice especially when it hangs and turns around a bit it s perfect to use on the christmas tree and can also be used on various decorations if you have a candlestick that fits a small hanger it will also be ideal ❤️ this listing is a pdf-pattern that downloads so you can make the ornament yourself skill level easy time to crochet 40 min size d 5 5 cm language terms us + dk danish crochet hook 2 5 mm materials cotton yarn 5 ply / sport and the best glitter yarn lurex from lammy yarns please note that this pattern is available for free on https //millabilla dk/en the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern happy crocheting - contact me at any time i m happy to help
